name: Guatemala es el primer país de Centroamérica con 1.000 muertes por COVID-19

name: Covid death total at 799 and 20,766 active cases
description: The death of 29 people on Tuesday, July 27 brought the total of COVID-19 victims to 799 while 957new cases raised the total of infections since March to 40,291.
